key_info.other_prizes: Physical trophies for top 3 in class championship

driver_table_info.description: Driver number

driver_table_info.label: Driver
driver_table_info.description: Driver name

driver_table_info.label: Team
driver_table_info.description: Driver is member of this team.

driver_table_info.label: Points
driver_table_info.description: Number of points the driver has scored during the season.

driver_table_info.label: ATT
driver_table_info.description: Points scored for the AlkenTech.com Simulation Trophy. Number of positions the driver has gained in heat races during the season. (AlkenTech.com Simulation Trophy)

driver_table_info.label: Wins
driver_table_info.description: Number of races the driver has won this season.

driver_table_info.label: Drop round
driver_table_info.description: Between brackets after each points column is the drop round for the driver. That is, the round with the worst result (excluding disqualifications).

driver_table_info.label: Tie breakers
driver_table_info.description: Feature wins -> Heat wins -> Average finishing position (excluding drop round) -> Highest finishing position -> Least lowest finishing position (excluding drop round)

driver_table_info.label: ATT tie breakers
driver_table_info.description: Lowest average incident points in heat races

team_table_info.label: Points
team_table_info.description: Combined number of points the drivers in the team have scored during the season.

team_table_info.label: Drop round
team_table_info.description: Hover (touch) the points to view the sum of the dropped points for the team.
